channel.title: How do i update my server?
channel.description: hey guys, i want to know how to update my server without shutting it down.. if there a server updater?

item.title: How do i update my server?
item.dc:creator: @belhelmiel belhelmiel
item.description:
@belhelmiel wrote:

If your on [PI] then go to your config file and change the save time to like 120 that way it saves every minute so people don’t get rolled back much. Folder for your config file: yourserversmainfolder/src/server. When you open up config look for something like this: public static final int SAVE_TIMER = 120; // save every 1 minute Hope I could help. It’s impossible for you to update your server without shutting it down for a sec.

P.S. Don’t set the save time too low it will lag down your server a bit if you do.

Read full topic
item.source: How do i update my server?

item.title: How do i update my server?
item.dc:creator: @Brandontan Brandontan
item.description:
@Brandontan wrote:

you have to shut it down for a second atleast, i could give you a commande called ::update seconds
where whenever you do like ::update 30 it will log everyone off so no one will get rolled back while you close out the server, recompile, and start it up again. usually it takes seconds to update your server.

Read full topic
